1.title: Terror in the Midnight Sun
1.plot: Joey and his monster pals are forced to watch "They Saved Hitler's Brain" (a.k.a. Madmen of Mandoras) by the evil Lady Midnight.

2.title: Moon of the Wolf
2.plot: Joey and his monster pals are forced to watch "In the Year 2889" by the evil Lady Midnight.

3.title: Voyage to the Prehistoric Planet
3.plot: Joey and his monster pals are forced to watch "Voyage to the Prehistoric Planet" by the evil Lady Midnight.

imdb.plot outline: Midnight's Haunted Drive-In is a homage to those old horror host shows with a little MST3k thrown in for good measure. It'll feature monster puppets, miniatures, public domain movies, and a rockin' Ska soundtrack! The show revolves around a dyslexic nurse named Joey (Joseph Russitano) and a nervous Mummy named Marv (Will Ryan of DAGames) and a bi-poler werewolf named Bud (Chris Dell'lsola of AficionadosChris.com) who are trapped by the evil vampiric Lady Midnight (Mary Owens), who forces him and his monster pals to watch weird public domain movies in her haunted drive-in!
imdb.title: Midnight's Haunted Drive-In!
plot: Midnight's Haunted Drive-In is a homage to those old horror host shows with a little MST3k thrown in for good measure. It'll feature monster puppets, miniatures, public domain movies, and a rockin' Ska soundtrack! The show revolves around a dyslexic nurse named Joey (Joseph Russitano) and a nervous Mummy named Marv (Will Ryan of DAGames) and a bi-poler werewolf named Bud (Chris Dell'lsola of AficionadosChris.com) who are trapped by the evil vampiric Lady Midnight (Mary Owens), who forces him and his monster pals to watch weird public domain movies in her haunted drive-in!::Joseph Russitano
